data.text: @TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey @fordnation People can protect themselves. If they want to wear a mask or not it should be a choice .
@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey @fordnation Yes.. take them off already.. I never wanted them in the first place and I’m a germ freak.. 🤦🏼‍♂️
@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey @fordnation Nope. The corrupt socialists running Venezuela North will have them back in place at the first opportunity. It's about control, not public health and safety.
@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey @fordnation Now suddenly PC and Libs are in a hurry to remove Musk mandates. The Truckers have opened peoples eyes.
@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey @fordnation Well 90% of masks worn by people don't actually stop Covid. Fact But is you want to wear a face diaper..go ahead.
@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey @fordnation Fords been promising the masks will go for a few weeks now. Why are we waiting to set a date?!

@TheTorontoSun @anthonyfurey @fordnation If they had just followed the post SARS report and put, at least, half the money towards improving our health care systems. Not throwing money in but cutting the paper pushers but to patient care.
